front.title: IREX 10

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This document presents a concept of operations (CONOPS) and an overview of an application programming interface (API) specification for the Iris Exchange (IREX) 10 Ongoing Evaluation of Iris Recognition, Identification Track. IREX is a program at the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), within the Information Technology Laboratory(ITL)/Information Access Division(IAD)/Image Group. IREX 10 is administered off-line in NIST s Biometrics Research Lab (BRL). Developers submit their matching software for testing over sequestered iris data. As an ongoing evaluation, developers may submit at any time unless otherwise specified on the IREX 10 Homepage: https://www.nist.gov/programs-projects/irex-10-identification-track.

seriesInfo.name: NIST technical note; NIST tech note; NIST TN
